name: Mining Outpost
description: A small, automated facility extracting valuable resources from asteroids or planetary rings.

name: Research Station
description: Dedicated to scientific study, often in remote or hazardous regions, focusing on unique phenomena.

name: Refueling Depot
description: A vital hub for starships to resupply fuel and basic provisions, often found near jump points.

name: Pirate Haven
description: A clandestine base of operations for outlaws and smugglers, hidden deep within asteroid fields or nebulae.

name: Orbital Habitat
description: A self-sustaining space station providing living quarters and amenities for a permanent population.

name: Listening Post
description: A remote surveillance station monitoring communications and detecting anomalies in deep space.

name: Trade Hub
description: A bustling commercial station where goods and services are exchanged, attracting merchants from across the sector.

name: Shipyard
description: A large-scale facility dedicated to the construction, repair, and retrofitting of starships.

name: Military Outpost
description: A fortified station serving as a strategic base for naval fleets, projecting power and ensuring sector security.

name: Derelict Station
description: The silent, drifting remains of a once-active station. It may hold forgotten secrets, dangers, or valuable salvage.
